quotient - rational numbers for Javascript

{% highlight bash %}$ npm install quotient{% endhighlight %} {% highlight bash %}var q = require('quotient');{% endhighlight %} {% highlight bash %}var half = q(1, 2);{% endhighlight %}

Creating a new fraction
